metadata.title: NIT Jalandhar Personnel & Administrative Contacts - Q&A

leadership.question: Who is the Director of NIT Jalandhar?
leadership.answer: Prof Binod Kumar Kanaujia is the Director of NIT Jalandhar. He holds a PhD from IIT BHU and serves as the chief academic and executive head of the institute. Email: director@nitj.ac.in or bkkanaujia@nitj.ac.in

leadership.question: Who is the Registrar of NIT Jalandhar?
leadership.answer: Prof Ajay Bansal is the Registrar of NIT Jalandhar. He holds a PhD from Panjab University, Chandigarh. The Registrar serves as the Secretary to the Institute and handles overall administrative affairs. Email: registrar@nitj.ac.in or bansala@nitj.ac.in

academic_deans.question: Who is the Dean of Academics at NIT Jalandhar?
academic_deans.answer: Prof Raman Bedi is the Dean (Academic) at NIT Jalandhar. He oversees all academic affairs and B.Tech programs. Email: da@nitj.ac.in or bedir@nitj.ac.in. Contact through him for academic matters, course approvals, and academic policies.

academic_deans.question: Who is the Dean of Planning & Development?
academic_deans.answer: Prof Subhash Chander is the Dean (Planning & Development) at NIT Jalandhar. He manages planning and development initiatives for the institute. Email: deanpd@nitj.ac.in or chanders@nitj.ac.in

academic_deans.question: Who is the Dean of Research & Consultancy?
academic_deans.answer: Prof Rohit Mehra is the Dean (Research & Consultancy). He oversees all research programs, research projects, and industry consultancy affairs. Email: drc@nitj.ac.in or mehrar@nitj.ac.in. Contact for research opportunities, project collaboration, and consultancy services.

academic_deans.question: Who is the Dean of Student Welfare?
academic_deans.answer: Prof Anish Sachdeva is the Dean (Student Welfare). He is responsible for student welfare, discipline, and overall student experience. Email: dsw@nitj.ac.in or asachdeva@nitj.ac.in. Contact for student-related issues, grievances, and welfare matters.

academic_deans.question: Who is the Dean of Faculty Welfare?
academic_deans.answer: Prof S. K. Sinha is the Dean (Faculty Welfare). He manages faculty development programs, welfare initiatives, and faculty support services. Email: dfw@nitj.ac.in or sinhask@nitj.ac.in

academic_deans.question: Who is the Dean of Industry and International Affairs?
academic_deans.answer: Prof Mamta Khosla is the Dean (Industry and International Affairs). She oversees industry partnerships, collaborations, and international affairs. Email: diia@nitj.ac.in or khoslam@nitj.ac.in. Contact for industry internships, international opportunities, and student exchange programs.

registrar_office.question: How do I contact the Registrar's Office?
registrar_office.answer: The Registrar's Office handles all administrative matters. You can contact: Registrar Prof Ajay Bansal (registrar@nitj.ac.in). For specific issues: Financial matters - Dr Gaurav Tandon, Deputy Registrar (Accounts & Finance) at drfa@nitj.ac.in. Staff matters - Mr Ramneek Kumar, Deputy Registrar (Establishment) at drestablishment@nitj.ac.in

registrar_office.question: Who handles academic certificates and documentation?
registrar_office.answer: Mr Neeraj (Assistant Registrar - Academic & Legal) handles academic matters and documentation. Email: aracademic@nitj.ac.in (academic) or arlegal@nitj.ac.in (legal matters). Contact for transcripts, certificates, degree documents, and legal certifications.

registrar_office.question: Who handles examination matters?
registrar_office.answer: Mr Ramesh Chand Meena, Assistant Registrar (Examination) handles all examination-related matters. Email: arexam@nitj.ac.in. Contact for exam schedules, question papers, result disputes, and examination queries.

student_affairs.question: Who should I contact for hostel-related issues?
student_affairs.answer: Contact your Hostel Warden directly for immediate hostel issues. Chief Warden is Dr Shailendra Bajpai (bajpais@nitj.ac.in, Phone: 9888895253) for major issues. For academic year 2024-25, wardens manage 17 different hostels. Each hostel has a dedicated warden for supervision.

student_affairs.question: Who is my Hostel Warden? (How to find?)
student_affairs.answer: There are 17 wardens for different hostels: Boys Hostels (BH-1 to BH-7), Modern Boys Hostels (MBA, MBH-A, MBH-B, MBH-F, MBH-Mess), and Girls Hostels (GH-1, GH-2, MGH, MGH Phase-II). Contact your hostel office or Chief Warden Dr Shailendra Bajpai (bajpais@nitj.ac.in) for warden details and direct contact information.

student_affairs.question: Who handles student grievances?
student_affairs.answer: For student grievances: First contact your Warden/Chief Warden or Dean (Student Welfare). Dr Anish Sachdeva, Dean (Student Welfare) - dsw@nitj.ac.in or asachdeva@nitj.ac.in. The institute has a Grievance Cell that handles genuine concerns after normal channels are exhausted.

placement_and_training.question: Who handles placements at NIT Jalandhar?
placement_and_training.answer: Dr Asutosh Kar is the Coordinator of Centre of Training & Placement (CTP). Email: ctp@nitj.ac.in. The team includes training officers: Mr Rohit Rana (MBA) and Mrs Harsh Malhotra. The CTP coordinates with major recruiters and achieved 91.88% placement rate with average package of 9.78 LPA.

placement_and_training.question: How do I contact the Training and Placement Cell?
placement_and_training.answer: Centre of Training & Placement (CTP) Email: ctp@nitj.ac.in or contact through Dean (Industry and International Affairs) Prof Mamta Khosla at diia@nitj.ac.in. Office is located on campus. The CTP coordinates internships, placements, and industry interactions.

medical_and_support.question: Who is the Medical Officer? Can I see the doctor?
medical_and_support.answer: Medical Officers: Dr Tarun Sehgal (sehgalt@nitj.ac.in) and Dr Sitakshi (bhatias@nitj.ac.in). The Medical Center is available on campus for student and staff health. Walk-in consultations are available. Contact the hostel warden or go directly to the medical center for urgent health matters.

medical_and_support.question: Who handles sports and physical education?
medical_and_support.answer: Dr G. S. Dhaliwal is the Head (Athletics) & Staff and Associate Professor of Physical Education. Email: dhaliwalgs@nitj.ac.in. Dr Vijay Kumar Mishra is the Sports Officer (Basketball). Contact for sports activities, fitness programs, and recreational facilities.

department_heads.question: How do I contact my department?
department_heads.answer: Each of the 7 departments (CSE, Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, ECE, Chemical, Biotechnology) has a Head and faculty. For department-specific matters: Visit department office, contact your course instructor, or email department coordinator. Contact Dean (Academic) Prof Raman Bedi (da@nitj.ac.in) for department-related academic issues.

department_heads.question: How do I find my course instructor or professor?
department_heads.answer: Visit your department office or check the institute website for faculty directory with names, qualifications, and email addresses. You can also contact the Department Head or Dean (Academic). Faculty office hours are usually available for student consultations.

special_centers_and_committees.question: Who leads the Centre of Training & Placement and Innovation?
special_centers_and_committees.answer: Centre of Training & Placement Coordinator: Dr Asutosh Kar. Institute Innovation Council: President - Dr B S Saini, Vice President - Dr T Srinivas, Convener - Dr Lalit Jajpura. For startup and innovation support, contact Dr B S Saini (sainibs@nitj.ac.in).

special_centers_and_committees.question: How do I contact the Library?
special_centers_and_committees.answer: The Central Library provides access to extensive collections, digital resources, and Wi-Fi connectivity. For library services, visit the library office on campus or contact through the Registrar's office. Library staff can help with book access, digital subscriptions, and research resources.

special_centers_and_committees.question: Who handles IT infrastructure and computing facilities?
special_centers_and_committees.answer: IT infrastructure is managed by the institute IT team. For computing facility issues, network problems, or Wi-Fi connectivity: Report through your department IT coordinator or contact the System Administrator through the Registrar's office (registrar@nitj.ac.in). Technical support available for lab and computing issues.

international_and_industry.question: For international student programs and exchange, whom should I contact?
international_and_industry.answer: Contact Dean (Industry and International Affairs) Prof Mamta Khosla (diia@nitj.ac.in). She manages international collaborations, student exchange programs, and global partnerships. Associate Deans: Dr M D Roy (roymd@nitj.ac.in) and Dr Kiran Singh (as3.diia@nitj.ac.in) also handle international affairs.

international_and_industry.question: How do I find industry internship and collaboration opportunities?
international_and_industry.answer: Contact: 1) Centre of Training & Placement (ctp@nitj.ac.in) for placements and major recruiting companies, 2) Dean (Industry and International Affairs) Prof Mamta Khosla (diia@nitj.ac.in) for industry partnerships, 3) Your Department Head for research collaborations. Major recruiters include Bajaj Finance, L&T, Amazon, and many tech companies.
